mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PHARMACY ( NUM, DUTYADDR, DUTYETC, DUTYNAME, DUTYTEL, DUTYMAPIMG, DUTYTIME1C, DUTYTIME2C, DUTYTIME3C, DUTYTIME4C, DUTYTIME5C, DUTYTIME6C, DUTYTIME7C, DUTYTIME8C, DUTYTIME1S, DUTYTIME2S, DUTYTIME3S, DUTYTIME4S, DUTYTIME5S, DUTYTIME6S, DUTYTIME7S, DUTYTIME8S, HPID, POSTCDN1, POSTCDN2, LON, LAT, DUTYWEEKENDAT, GEOM, X, Y )VALUES( #{NUM}, #{DUTYADDR}, #{DUTYETC}, #{DUTYNAME}, #{DUTYTEL}, #{DUTYMAPIMG}, #{DUTYTIME1C}, #{DUTYTIME2C}, #{DUTYTIME3C}, #{DUTYTIME4C}, #{DUTYTIME5C}, #{DUTYTIME6C}, #{DUTYTIME7C}, #{DUTYTIME8C}, #{DUTYTIME1S}, #{DUTYTIME2S}, #{DUTYTIME3S}, #{DUTYTIME4S}, #{DUTYTIME5S}, #{DUTYTIME6S}, #{DUTYTIME7S}, #{DUTYTIME8S}, #{HPID}, #{POSTCDN1}, #{POSTCDN2}, #{LON}, #{LAT}, #{DUTYWEEKENDAT}, sdo_geometry(2001,3857,mdsys.sdo_point_type(#{X},#{Y}, NULL),NULL,NULL), #{X}, #{Y} )
